result.title: Final samples from both powder sources (fresh and recycling) by both injection and compression moulding technologies at lab scale
result.description: Final samples from both powder sources (fresh and recycling) by both injection and compression moulding technologies at lab scale. Since powders from WP1 and WP4 were not available, preliminary samples produced until month 24 were manufactured using equivalent commercial powders (AICHI HDDR irregular powder and spherical isotropic MQP-S-11-9 powder from MAGNEQUENCH). This was useful to determine the injection and compression moulding parameter. The extension of the Task 2.1 is requested to manufacture the final samples using the powders developed in NEOHIRE

result.title: Report on services, products and tools added value and benefits
result.description:
Describe and estimate the benefits and added value of these customised services and tools for customers according to their requirements (WP2). Describe and estimate internally the benefits and added value of these customised services and tools for each partner according to the operations model and costs (WP2) Estimate internally the benefits and added value of these customised services and tools wrt to existing competition products and services within the market (WP2)
Deliverable will be updated at M28.
